rows.label: bf11600100_0010
rows.name: A place like this exists in the capital?

rows.label: bf11600100_0020
rows.name: It's the womb of the Iiran Divine Beast.

rows.label: bf11600100_0040
rows.name:
It's the place where Blades come at the end
of their lives to be reborn as Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf11600100_0060
rows.name:
Then does that mean we'll
become Divine Beasts someday?

rows.label: bf11600100_0090
rows.name:
Mhm! I was a Blade born
from the Iiran Divine Beast.

rows.label: bf11600100_0100
rows.name: Though I don't remember being a Blade...

rows.label: bf11600100_0110
rows.name:
Once a Blade becomes a Divine Beast,
they live on even after their Driver dies.

rows.label: bf11600100_0120
rows.name:
Eventually, they become a new land, protecting
and nurturing the descendants of their Drivers.

rows.label: bf11600100_0130
rows.name: A fleeting relationship becomes an eternal one.

rows.label: bf11600100_0140
rows.name: It's the object of Iiran faith.

rows.label: bf11600100_0220
rows.name: Then there's no way he'd throw away his big moment.

rows.label: bf11600100_0230
rows.name: He said that humans long for death.

rows.label: bf11600100_0240
rows.name: And that he'd give them a push.
